author: uschindler
msg: LUCENE-1453: Remove the complicated closeDir handling from DirectoryReader which no longer "owns" the FSDirectory. A FilterIndexReader, that is wrapped around the DirectoryReader by IndexReader.open(), will handle the closing of the dir. This wrapper and all File/String IndexReader.open()'s will be removed in 3.0.
